  • Method Details

    • makeReservation

      public Reservation makeReservation​(Flight flight, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String citizenship) throws NoMoreSeatsException
      If seat is available, reservation is created and added the the reservations arrayList;
      Parameters:
      flight - flight of the reservation
      name - name of the person making the reservation
      citizenship - citizenship of the person making the reservation.
      Returns:
      If seat is available returns reservation else returns null.
      Throws:
      NoMoreSeatsException

    • findReservations

      public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> findReservations​(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String airline, java.lang.String name)
      Finds all the flight that has matching reservation code, airline, or name.
      Parameters:
      code - code of the reservation.
      airline - airline code
      name - name of the client
      Returns:
      ArrayList of reservation that matches the parameter.

    • findReservationByCode

      public Reservation findReservationByCode​(java.lang.String code)
      Finds reservation by reservation code
      Parameters:
      code - reservation code
      Returns:
      If matching reservation code returns reservation, else null.

    • persist

      public void persist() throws java.io.IOException
      Saves reservations arrayList as Binary bin file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      private int getAvailableSeats​(Flight flight)
      Gets the amount of available seats left in a flight

      Returns:
      available seats left in a flight

    • generateReservationCode

      private java.lang.String generateReservationCode​(Flight flight)
      Generates a reservation code
      Parameters:
      flight - flight that is to be reserved
      Returns:
      generated reservation code.

    • populateFromBinary

      private void populateFromBinary() throws java.io.IOException
      Reads from Binary Bin file, and populates the reservations arrayList.

      java.io.IOException
